text: Fhum kha buni zorga kim, Zisas Krais nta ndi hiaŋ tɨgi. Fhe Bakɨme maaŋ muuŋgiap, kha bunin Zisas ga nɨɨŋgim, ana ntan won ŋaara gumgi khɨvɨrga. Mba bigi, nta vhemkora hɨgɨrga. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, Zisas won enser ga sarigim, ana za mba bigi bun, gu Zon anan ŋaara guma, ana nta bun na suaŋgi. Gu mba buni bun ana ŋaara gumgi ga suanga.
